body:
This has, with all the technical issues, been a really great way to 
follow the workshop. I think all of us, who had for whatever reason not 
been able to attend, are really thankful for sharing the presentations 
and the audio stream! Great work! Cheers, Lars.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2011-August/008134.html).</sup>
